channel.title: Dual wielding items? help please
channel.description:
Ok recently ive been on some private servers that have some items like dual energy sword or dual lightsabers or dual blade blades and god swords etc. i have some single weapon models how could i make them dual wield ive been toying around with them all day can someone help me please?
I CANNOT FIND ANY THING POSTED ABOUT IT AND YES IVE USED THE SEARCH TAB i know that i need to edit the cache buch which int and dont call me noob pl0x -.-
